title: Unable to launch client
body: I have manually reinstalled league, clean uninstalled it with hextech repair tool, tried to open lol.launcher.admin amongst other things and still cant open the client. The loading symbol appears after opening it once and if i try again it opens a blank window of the size the client would usually be but cant do anything with it. only closes with task manager.

replies.body:
I'm having similar issues and I don't know whats going on!
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/FGY65AAl-league-wont-work
i had similar issues reinstalled it and then it is stuck on the login authentication i have also started a conversation headed 'LOGIN ISSUES'

The patcher failing to launch like this can happen by an overzealous antivirus or security setting preventing it.  My suggestion would be to run through every step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and add league as an exception.  Let me know if you have any questions about that.
